page.title: 06The School Day class 3
page.content: We start school at 9.am with 1 1/4 hours of mathematics.We are doing fractions, decimals, ratios, measuring and weighing this term.At 10.15am the whole school goes into the hall for assembly.We have a story, a hymn and a prayer usually. We go outside to play for 15 minutes after assembly.Then we do{Creative {Writing}or{Topic}or{Religious {Education}until 12.00 noon dinnertime. School begins again at 1.15pm when we do{Art}and{Craft, Topic, Music, Games and{English Langauge.}We have a 15 minute break in the afternoon and at 3.00pm Mrs Stephenson reads a serialised story to us before we go home at 3.30pm.It is 'Toms Midnight Garden' this term. We play netball and football in the winter and rounders, cricket and tennis in the summer.
